price: Lalle ne, manãfukai sunã a magangara mafi ƙasƙanci daga wuta. Kuma bã zã ka sãma musu mataimaki ba.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ فِي ٱلدَّرۡكِ ٱلۡأَسۡفَلِ مِنَ ٱلنَّارِ وَلَن تَجِدَ لَهُمۡ نَصِيرًا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna al-munāfiqīna fī al-darki al-asfali mina al-nāri walan tajida lahum naṣīran
